divs: Sighting DetailsI just got of of work, and was going to my mothers house. I stoped at the light at jefferson and woodward downtown Detroit, I looked up just over the builings and saw 6 ufos together and one about 100 yards behind the six, they were only about 1 or 2 hundred feet above the builings. they looked like they were maked out of aluminum. The light changed, and I drove under cobo hall to Jefferson and droved to the river, I got out of my car and watched them turn towards the ambassador bridge moving slowly, I watched them go over the the large part of the bridge on the canadian side. there were no windows or doors and the sky was clear.
trends: There have been 56 other sightings in Detroit
There were no other sightings in Detroit on or around June 15th 1978
Summary: Seven ufo's above Detroit on a clear moring.
